response.overview: In the cutthroat world of indie filmmaking, ambition often comes at a steep price. A group of filmmakers gathers for what they believe to be a routine crew call - an invitation to collaborate on their next big project. Instead, they walk into a sinister trap where their darkest secrets are exposed, and their worst fears come to life. Each attendee has a hidden past intertwined with the abuse of a rising actress named Courtney Monroe, who sought fame but found herself betrayed and discarded. Some were direct perpetrators, while others remained silent bystanders. Now, a mysterious game master seeks to make them confront their guilt - in a game where losing means death.
response.title: Crew Call
